title: Polki Diamond and Emerald Haaram - An Enchanting Legacy
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Polki diamonds boast exceptional clarity and brilliance. Emerald is AAA grade with rich color saturation.
features: This exquisite haaram features a captivating geometric design composed of triangular settings encrusted with Polki diamonds. Each diamond is carefully hand-set in a closed setting, highlighting its natural brilliance. The haaram culminates in a stunning emerald pendant, surrounded by a halo of sparkling Polki diamonds. The design showcases a contemporary twist on traditional South Indian Polki craftsmanship, blending geometric precision with the timeless beauty of uncut diamonds and a vibrant emerald.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Also a sophisticated choice for upscale galas and formal events.
description: This haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of Polki diamonds and a rich green emerald creates a mesmerizing effect. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a lustrous sheen, enhancing the overall beauty of the piece. Polki diamonds are highly prized for their natural beauty and historical significance, making this haaram a valuable heirloom piece. Wear a piece of history and tradition with modern refinement.
